name: Drawaria.online
description:
Drawaria.online is multiplayer game in which players draw and guess random words.

A group of players takes turns drawing an image of a secret word, while others try to guess the word before the time expires.

Person who scores the most points in a series of rounds wins the game.

Controls:
Left mouse button: Draw 
Right mouse button: Erase
Mouse wheel: Change brush size
Keyboard to chat

When choosing word you can press 1, 2 or 3 on keyboard to quickly select corresponding word from list
